code: @Manual{,   title = {PEcAn.BIOCRO: PEcAn Package for Integration of the BioCro Model},   author = {David LeBauer and Chris Black and Deepak Jaiswal},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 1.7.5},   url = {https://pecanproject.github.io}, }

what: PEcAn Package for Integration of the BioCro Model
title: PEcAn Package for Integration of the BioCro Model
text: BioCro model estimates photosynthesis leaf, canopy, ecosystem levels determines plant biomass allocation crop yields, using underlying physiological ecological processes .

title: PEcAn Package for Integration of the BioCro Model
text: can install development version PEcAn.BIOCRO r-universe like : can install directly GitHub remotes package like :
code: # Enable repository from pecanproject options(repos = c(   pecanproject = 'https://pecanproject.r-universe.dev',   CRAN = 'https://cloud.r-project.org')) # Download and install PEcAn.BIOCRO in R install.packages('PEcAn.BIOCRO') library(remotes) install_github('pecanproject/pecan',  subdir = "models/biocro")

title: PEcAn Package for Integration of the BioCro Model

what: Converts a CF data frame into a BioCro met input — cf2biocro
title: Converts a CF data frame into a BioCro met input — cf2biocro
text: Converts CF data frame BioCro met input

title: Converts a CF data frame into a BioCro met input — cf2biocro
Converts a CF data frame into a BioCro met input — cf2biocro
text: met data.table object  met single site; output load.cfmet year int month int day int: day month (1-31) doy int: day year (1-366) hour int (0-23) date YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS POSIXct wind_speed num m/s northward_wind  eastward_wind  ppfd optional; missing, requires surface_downwelling_shortwave_flux_in_air surface_downwelling_shortwave_flux_in_air  air_pressure (Pa) optional; missing, requires relative_humidity specific_humidity optional; missing, requires relative_humidity relative_humidity optional; missing, requires air_pressure specific_humidity precipitation_flux  air_temperature  longitude degrees east, used calculating solar noon zulu2solarnoon logical; TRUE, convert time GMT local solar time.

title: Converts a CF data frame into a BioCro met input — cf2biocro
text: data.table / data.frame fields doy day year hr hour solar solar radiation (PPFD) temp temperature, degrees celsius rh relative humidity, fraction (0-1) windspeed m/s precip cm/h

Look for defaults provided as datasets in the BioCro model package — get_biocro_defaults
text: genus Name genus (really string BioCro uses *_parameters prefix)

title: Look for defaults provided as datasets in the BioCro model package — get_biocro_defaults
text: list format expected `BioCro::Gro()`,   containing four lists named `type`, `initial_values`, `parameters`, `modules`,   NULL genus found

title: Write BioCro met files — met2model.BIOCRO
text: Converts met CF file model specific met file. input files called <.path>/<.prefix>.YYYY.cf

title: Write BioCro met files — met2model.BIOCRO
code: met2model.BIOCRO(   in.path,   in.prefix,   outfolder,   overwrite = FALSE,   lat,   lon,   start_date,   end_date,   ... )

title: Write BioCro met files — met2model.BIOCRO
text: .path path disk CF file lives .prefix prefix file outfolder location model specific output written overwrite logical: Write existing file name? FALSE, leaves existing file untouched skips next year. lat, lon Site latitude longitude start_date, end_date Date range convert. year written separate file ... arguments passed PEcAn, currently ignored

text: dataframe information written file

title: Run BioCro at a point — run.biocro
code: run.biocro(   lat,   lon,   metpath,   soil.nc = NULL,   config = config,   coppice.interval = 1 )

title: Run BioCro at a point — run.biocro
text: lat latitude decimal degrees lon longitude decimal degrees metpath full path name prefix csv file hourly data BioCro format, e.g. `/dir/met` files used `/dir/met.2004.csv` `dir/met.2005.csv' soil.nc full path name netCDF file soil data config full path name config.xml file containing parameter values configuration information BioCro coppice.interval numeric, number years cuttings coppice plant perennial grass. used BioCro 0.9; ignored using later versions.

title: Run BioCro at a point — run.biocro
text: output one BioCro::*.Gro functions (determined config$genus), data.table object

title: Run BioCro at a point — run.biocro

Writes a configuration files for the biocro model — write.config.BIOCRO
text: defaults named list default model parameter values trait.values named list (dataframe trait values)  can either data.frame named list traits, e.g. data.frame(vmax = 1, b0 = 2) list(vmax = 1, b0 = 2) settings pecan settings file configured BioCro run.id integer; unique identifier run.

title: PEcAn.BIOCRO 1.7.5
text: model2netcdf.BIOCRO longer writes separate <year>.nc.var files every year output. Use PEcAn.utils::nc_write_varfiles() create needed.

title: PEcAn.BIOCRO 1.7.4
text: PEcAn.BIOCRO now distributed BSD three-clause license instead NCSA Open Source license.

title: PEcAn.BIOCRO 1.7.4
text: Added NEWS.md file track changes package. Prior point changes tracked main CHANGELOG PEcAn repository.
